other_title: 装甲騎兵ボトムズ Case;IRVINE —ケース;アービン— (Japanese)
plot: Irvine Lester is an AT repairman. In order to make a living with his sister, he is secretly fighting in AT gambling matches and intentionally losing the games for money. But the other fighters find out about his excellent AT maneuvering skills and demand a real match.
